short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Deletes annoying pop-ups, fills necessary boxes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your shopping experience on agents!

✨🛒✨
EASY AGENTS is a feature-packed browser extension crafted to streamline and optimize your shopping on agents. Ideal for both regular buyers and casual browsers, this tool offers a range of enhancements to make your shopping journey smoother and more efficient
✨🛒 ✨

🚫 Warn Reminder Removal: Easily eliminate disruptive pop-ups for a seamless, uninterrupted shopping experience.

✅ Automatic Agree: Automatically enables the "Agree" checkbox on best deals.

🔍 Easiest Quality Check: Verify product's quality by pressing only one button!

🔄 Link Converter: converts other agents link into your favourite kakobuy one!

❗ Extension uses affiliate links to support creator.
